name: Habit Tracker | Free Notion Template
description: Habit tracking doesn’t need to be complicated.The Simple Habit Tracker template makes building and tracking habits effortless, while giving you powerful data on how you're doing across days, weeks, months, and quarters.And it's all in one easy to use dashboard.How does it work? Define habits you want to track Customize the template Reflect on your performance That’s it.We often overcomplicate habit tracking, before we’ve even decided which habits are highest priority.Here's a walkthrough of how
features: Define habits you want to track; Customize the template; Reflect on your performance
